compliant.section: We will collect, store and process your Personal Information in accordance with your rights under any applicable laws.
compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data: lawfulness, fairness and transparency, purpose limitation, data minimisation, accuracy, storage limitation, integrity and confidentiality, accountability.

non_compliant.section: However, please note that although we take appropriate steps to protect your Personal Information, no website, product, device, online application or transmission of Information, computer system or wireless connection is completely secure and therefore we cannot guarantee the security of your Personal Information.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Integrity and confidentiality.  Security of processing.
non_compliant.amend: While absolute security cannot be guaranteed, the statement should be reframed to emphasize the  implementation of appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure a level of security appropriate to the risk.

non_compliant.section: Please contact us if you become aware of any technical weakness that could damage NUVOTON SERVICE.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Notification of a personal data breach to the supervisory authority, Communication of a personal data breach to the data subject
non_compliant.amend: This statement should be replaced or accompanied by a clear and accessible procedure for reporting data breaches, outlining how individuals can report suspected vulnerabilities or incidents related to their Personal Information. This procedure should comply with Articles 33 and 34 of the GDPR, which require organizations to report data breaches to the supervisory authority and, in certain cases, to the affected individuals.
